text: Jessica Pieri (born 24 April 1997) is an Italian tennis player. Pieri has a career-high WTA singles ranking of 205, achieved on 28 May 2018. She also has a career-high WTA doubles ranking of 563, achieved on 15 July 2019. She has won six ITF singles titles. Pieri made her main draw WTA Tour debut at the 2019 Internazionali Femminili di Palermo, where she qualified for the main draw defeating Laura Pigossi in the final qualifying round. ==ITF Circuit
